title: How to Aim a Tank in a War Thunder Realistic Battle

steps.headline: Learn your sight.
steps.description: Each dash on the vertical axis means 200 meters. Tanks will automatically adjust these dashes to shell and gun type. It is best to fire when the crosshair is green, in which the tank shell can penetrate the tank.

steps.headline: Identify ranges.
steps.description: With practice, you should be able to identify different ranges and know where to aim. If identifying ranges is too hard for you, bind a key in the controls menu to "rangefinder". The rangefinder will tell you the estimated range that a tank is at.

steps.headline: Practice in "test drive".
steps.description: In test drive, you will be able to experiment with your tank gun at different ranges without worrying about being killed. Remember to adjust your test drive settings to realistic battles.

steps.headline: Play.
steps.description: The only way you can get better at tank realistic battles is to play! Don't worry about not hitting your target the first few times; it takes practice.
